DOC.brief_summary: Family usually had a lot of burden to tell the truth to patients. The purpose of this study is to assess the effect of education materials and family conference for advanced cancer patients and family.
DOC.brief_title: Intervention Toward Truth-Telling and Advanced Directives in the Patient With Advanced or Metastatic Disease
DOC.criteria: advanced or metastatic cancer patients more than 20 years old clear consciousness and be able to communicate refuse to know the statement of himself/herself disease
